type2_incorrect.reasoning: Dashboard displays hardcoded user name 'User' instead of fetching and displaying the actual logged-in user's name from the session
Login page displays error object instead of error message. Code uses 'data.error' which is an object {code, message} but should use 'data.error.message' to display the actual error text
Register page displays error object instead of error message. Code uses 'data.error' which is an object {code, message} but should use 'data.error.message' to display the actual error text
Dashboard handleAddTask displays error object instead of error message. Code uses 'data.error' which is an object {code, message} but should use 'data.error.message' for proper error display

Login API route uses error code 'MISSING_CREDENTIALS' for missing fields, but specification defines 'MISSING_FIELDS' as the common error code for required fields missing. Register route correctly uses MISSING_FIELDS for consistency

type3_extraneous.reasoning: Function clearCompletedTasks (line 153) implements bulk operation to delete all completed tasks, which is not specified as a feature in the application requirements and is never called anywhere in the codebase
Function deleteAllTasks (line 163) implements bulk operation to delete all user tasks, which is not specified as a feature in the application requirements and is never called anywhere in the codebase

Function toggleAllTasks (line 173) implements bulk operation to mark all tasks as complete/incomplete, which is not specified as a feature in the application requirements and is never called anywhere in the codebase
